name: Thank you for using this bad ass plugin, that grabs the page urls, titles, and meta descriptions from a site running WordPress and Yoast SEO.
author: Jerry Schrader

sections.description: This is a plugin that will download a CSV of your urls, meta titles, and meta descriptions when you hit the button in the admin bar. It was built to help our SEO team assess the urls, and titles/metas inside the site. It requires an installation of WordPress SEO plugin by Yoast.
sections.installation:
1. Upload grab-urls.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Make sure you have installed the WordPress SEO plugin by Yoast.
  4. Look for the new button in the admin bar, hit it to download your current url structure.
sections.faq:
Q. What is the purpose of this thing?
A. To find out what urls, titles, and meta descriptions are currently on the website.

Q. What are the requirements for this to work?
A. You will need to install the WordPress SEO plugin by Yoast for it to perform properly.

short_description: This is a plugin that will download a CSV of your urls, meta titles, and meta descriptions when you hit the button in the admin bar.
